amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 116-377 to require the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission to submit yearly reports for 5-years to Congress on the number of age discrimination claims brought under this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 116-377 to require the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission to submit yearly reports for 5-years to Congress on the number of age discrimination claims brought under this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Brown (MD).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
